author: Special Correspondent
text: Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Tuesday announced a solatium of Rs. three lakh to each of the families of 23 police personnel, who died in various incidents across the State between August and October last. In a statement, Ms. Jayalalithaa expressed her condolences to the bereaved families. While 18 police personnel died of illness, another four died in road accidents and one was run over by train.
title: Solatium announced
